Solar theme for Python Sphinx¶

Solar is an attempt to create a theme for Sphinx based on the Solarized color scheme.

Preview¶

http://vimalkumar.in/sphinx-themes/solar

Download¶

Released versions are available from http://github.com/vkvn/sphinx-themes/downloads

Installation¶

  1. Extract the archive.
  2. Modify conf.py of an existing Sphinx project or create new project using sphinx-quickstart.
  3. Change the html_theme parameter to solar.
  4. Change the html_theme_path to the location containing the extracted archive.

License¶

GNU General Public License.

Credits¶

Modified from the default Sphinx theme – Sphinxdoc

Background pattern from http://subtlepatterns.com.
